description:
Get a handle on comfort. If you’re constantly repositioning your hands, or always on the lookout for padded cycling the gloves, the GP1 are worth a try. Designed to keep your hands and wrists happy on long rides, the GP1 performs just as well on your daily commute, as they do on a weekend tour. With their flared wing, the GP1 grips relieve pressure on the ulnar nerve and increase support for your whole hand. As one size doesn’t always fit all, there are 2 sizes to choose from, ensuring confident and comfortable grip.

  • Supple UV-resistant rubber absorbs vibration
  • Wing increases comfort and support by evenly spreading pressure over your whole palm
  • Wing promotes a neutral grip position which relieves pressure on the median nerve and improve circulation on long rides
  • Small are recommended for people who wear a XS-M glove. Large are recommended for people who wear a M-XL glove
  • Single lockring for easy installation
  • Designed for straight bars
name: Ergon GP1 Standard Grips
